author: ajsutton
content: To follow up on the attestations not getting you slashed, you do get away with that for a fair while because creating the *same* attestation in two places isn't slashable (you still only created one unique attestation).  But you get slashed as soon as you wind up producing different attestations for any reason (typically a block is received on time at one node and late at the other so you vote for a different head).
